plot: A trio of thugs go on a kidnapping-and-rape rampage, first with a busty hitchhiker and then with a family of four--including two horny daughters.
title: Appointment with Agony
plot_es: A trio of thugs go on a kidnapping-and-rape rampage, first with a busty hitchhiker and then with a family of four--including two horny daughters.
plot_en: A trio of thugs go on a kidnapping-and-rape rampage, first with a busty hitchhiker and then with a family of four--including two horny daughters.
